name: Hartifacts
description:
A small puzzle game about connecting cities with roads to retrieve valuable artifacts from ancient temples! You earn money by connecting to cities, spend money to build roads and unlock new road types, and your goal is to connect the roads to temples.

Most controls are done with mouse. Press [ECS] to exit or [R] to restart a level.

The levels are stored in the levels/ folder and are simple PNG files, sorted alphabetically to determine the levels order. You absolutely can (and should if you liked the game!) make your own levels!
